text: Of all our dreams today there is none more important - or so hard to realise - than that of peace in the world. May we never lose our faith in it or our resolve to do everything that can be done to convert it one day into reality.
author: Lester B. Pearson

text: We have a vision of South Africa in which black and white shall live and work together as equals in conditions of peace and prosperity.
author: Oliver Tambo

text: The man who has gotten everything he wants is all in favor of peace and order.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

text: Every human longs for peace and love.
author: Hiawatha

text: Only the person who has experienced light and darkness, war and peace, rise and fall, only that person has truly experienced life.
author: Stefan Zweig
